items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t understand because he wasn\'t paying attention.
Tom\'s dog cowered under the kitchen table during the storm.
Tom\'s heart stopped, but the doctors managed to revive him.
Tom\'s mother always told him he should eat more vegetables.
Tom\'s mother got angry when she saw Tom jumping on his bed.
We can\'t let Tom get away with murdering those four people.
I think you ought to forgive us, now that we\'ve apologized.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom hasn\'t finished his homework yet.
Don\'t ask questions yet. Just listen to what I have to say.
Every author suffers from writer\'s block from time to time.
One of the children is studying, but the others are playing.
Please write down your name, address, and phone number here.
I just don\'t understand why people would want to live here.
I\'m not the only one here who thinks Tom isn\'t a nice guy.
Tom is going to have to do something he doesn\'t want to do.
Tom knew he didn\'t have enough money to buy what he needed.
Tom likes to listen to music while he\'s doing his homework.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t make themselves understood in French.
Tom and Mary haven\'t gone swimming together in a long time.
I ran into an old friend of mine at the party the other day.
